answerText: catalysts[10] Speaking of moving things from one phase to another, this procedure uses a separatory funnel, pipet, or other device to selectively remove one phase. Phenol-chloroform is used to do this to DNA.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 8 | 4 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Cinchona alkaloids and quaternary ammonium salts can act as these substances by carrying reactants to a single phase, and a key parameter characterizing porous ones is the Thiele modulus. For 10 points each: [10] Name these substances that decrease the activation energy of a reaction.
